clientserver

Class ServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientserver.ServerController

  • public class ServerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is the controller between the server and game logic of the program, this holds the link between two main parts of the program, the server and the game logic, this class contains a parser that parses the message sent from the server, updates the game board in regards of what was sent from the client and sends something back through the server
    Author:
    Simon Glew and Jack Slater

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerController(Server server)
      Constructor that gets called when a server is made and creates a new game system object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Calls the broadcast method with giving it a message to send, this is used for the popups
      void broadcastBoard(Board b)
      Calls the broadcast method with giving it a board to send
      void broadcastGameMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Calls the broadcast method with giving it a message to send, this is used for the popups

      Calls the broadcast method with passing in the correct ID that you want send the message too, this is used for the popups
      GameSystem.Direction convertToDirection(java.lang.String s)
      Method that makes a string of the direction and returns it as a direction
      Player getPlayerByUserName(java.lang.String name)
      Getter for a player when given a username of a player
      int getServerTime()
      Method that gets the current server time
      java.lang.String parseDropItemCommand(java.util.Scanner s)
      Method that is called if drop is the start of the player message, this finds the player and and the item you want to drop and drops the item onto the board
      java.lang.String parseInput(PlayerCommand message)
      Start of the top down parser that is used for deciphering what was sent from the client
      java.lang.String parseLoginCommand(java.util.Scanner s)
      Method that is called if login is the start of the player message, this checks if the player is already logged in and if not it puts the player at the correct spot, either in one of the spawn locations or in the position that the player was in before he disconnects
      java.lang.String parseMoveCommand(java.util.Scanner s)
      Method that is called if move is the start of the player message, this finds the player and the direction that the player wants to move and moves the player on the board if it is allowe
      java.lang.String parsePickupItemCommand(java.util.Scanner s)
      Method that is called if pickup is the start of the player message, this finds the player and the tile the player is currently on and puts that item on the tile into the the players inventory
      java.lang.String parseSiphonBananaCommand(java.util.Scanner s)
      Method that is called if siphon is the start of the player message, this finds the player and the banana you want to siphon and siphons the banana onto the board
      java.lang.String parseUseItemCommand(java.util.Scanner s)
      Method that is called if use is the start of the player message, this finds the player and the item you want to use and uses the item on the current player
      Board requestBoard()
      Getter for getting the board from the game system to be send back through the server
      void tick(int time)
      Method that gets called each second of the time thread and changes the npc movement
